message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money.
I'll meet you halfway, sort of
This is getting us nowhere. I'm edging closer, but time is literally money for me!
You're getting closer, but I can wait
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm taking a hit with each round. This is fair, and we should both walk away with something.
You're running out of time, I'm not
Alice, this is it. Take it or leave it. My final offer - a near even split.  We're both losing out if we wait any longer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still waiting for a better one
Alice, this is absolutely my final offer. A clean, even split. If you reject this, I'm walking away and we both get nothing.  Decide now.
